entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
